Grid:
1 | 1
--+---
1 | 1
topLeft returns Node(val=1, isLeaf=True)
topRight returns Node(val=1, isLeaf=True)
botLeft returns Node(val=1, isLeaf=True)
botRight returns Node(val=1, isLeaf=True)

The entire grid is all the same value, and can be represented by a single node.
Return Node(val=1, isLeaf=True)

Grid:
0 | 1
--+---
1 | 1
topLeft returns Node(val=0, isLeaf=True)
topRight returns Node(val=1, isLeaf=True)
botLeft returns Node(val=1, isLeaf=True)
botRight returns Node(val=1, isLeaf=True)

The grid contains multiple values. The current node needs children nodes.
Return Node(0, True, topLeft, topRight, botLeft, botRight)
